channel.title: Trying to compile my server... got this error help plz?
channel.description: the system cannot find the path specified

item.title: Trying to compile my server... got this error help plz?
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“420kid420, post:6, topic:506808”]@echo off
title Kandarin Server 2010
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

says cannot find path specified when trying to run the server source… this is the run code… im using the newest version of java[/quote]
ok go to Java in Program files look at your “jre folder”

Where it says “jre6” you want to replace that number with the number that was in your Java folder for example.

and voula your done since it’s a .bat you don’t need to compile only compile for java files
If you can’t figure this out then i suggest you don’t code rsps and just play a server

Read full topic

item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“420kid420, post:6, topic:506808”]@echo off
title Kandarin Server 2010
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

says cannot find path specified when trying to run the server source… this is the run code… im using the newest version of java[/quote]
Do you have JRE6 or JRE7?

item.title: Trying to compile my server... got this error help plz?
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“420kid420, post:3, topic:506808”]null amount could you help me set up and compile my server for me? im having so many troubles… i edited the compiler and updated the code to the latest java now it says

note: some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations
note: recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details

also when i try logging in to test my client it says error connecting to server[/quote]
Sorry I had to quote you for my sig… But your compiler is fine if it has errors it will say error in it… you can’t login because you’re not clicking run lol

Read full topic
